definition: to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: In their final stages the mergers are expected to be intense sources of gravitational waves.
sentences.chinese: 預計在最後階段它們會合併成爲強引力波源。

sentences.english: Sometimes likened to UFOs, lenticular clouds are usually created by gravity waves.
sentences.chinese: 透鏡狀雲彩很像UFO，它通常由引力波造成。

sentences.english: The laser interferometer is like a microphone that converts gravitational waves into electrical signals.
sentences.chinese: 激光反射器就像一個轉換器將引力波轉換成電信號。

sentences.english: Gravitational waves can't exist in one or two-dimensional space.
sentences.chinese: 在一維或二維空間，引力波無法存在。

sentences.english: We will prove him wrong and show that we can really find it.
sentences.chinese: 我們要證明他錯了，證明我們能找到引力波。

sentences.english: It is the gravitational field and mass flow field that the gravitational wave is produced by the induction each other.
sentences.chinese: 正是引力場與質流場相互感應導致引力波。

sentences.english: These waves are what those current and planned gravitational wave detectors are designed to look for.
sentences.chinese: 現有的和待造的引力波探測器就是爲它們準備的。

sentences.english: Weber claims recently to have observed gravitational waves coming from the centre of the galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 最近，韋伯聲稱已觀察到來自銀河系中心的引力波。

sentences.english: How will the detectors know if a ripple of gravity passes through the Earth? Per Caltech's official LIGO Website
sentences.chinese: 觀測器如何探測穿過地球的引力波漣漪呢？

sentences.english: They are likely sources of gravitational waves.
sentences.chinese: 它們很有可能就是引力波源。

sentences.english: for he meant actually that we will never observe gravitational waves.
sentences.chinese: 他的意思其實是我們永遠無法觀察引力波。

definition: neutrino (particle physics)/also written 微中子[wei1 zhong1 zi3]

pinyin: Xi1 ge2 si1 bo1 se4 zi3

definition: Large Hadron Collider (LHC) at CERN, Geneva, Switzerland
pinyin: Da4 xing2 Qiang2 zi3 Dui4 zhuang4 Ji1
